content:
Please Note, This site is still under construction.
Saurabh Steixner-Kumar is a researcher at the systems neuroscience department at the university hospital (part of hamburg university) in Hamburg, Germany .
His research interests include social decision making, bayesian statistics, reinforcement-learning, modeling, EEG hyperscanning.
